headline.title: Enhanced Session Intelligence
headline.subtitle: Synced from canonical session + dual-notes pipeline

findings: Pain after driving was about 4 out of 10.
assignments: Good. Keep anti-rotation band work: 2 sets of 8 each side.
Add wall press with exhale holds: 3 sets of 5, 20 second holds.
Capture a custom metric called morning_settle_minutes each day.
follow_ups: Track morning_settle_minutes daily and review trend before next session.

operational.title: Operational Notes
priorities: Preserve consistency on current assignment block.
Observe sensitivity signals during rotation/load transitions.
Log daily custom metrics for progression decisions.
action_checklist: 1. Good. Keep anti-rotation band work: 2 sets of 8 each side.
2. Add wall press with exhale holds: 3 sets of 5, 20 second holds.
3. Capture a custom metric called morning_settle_minutes each day.
follow_up_actions: Track morning_settle_minutes daily and review trend before next session.
blockers_or_watchouts: Pain after driving was about 4 out of 10.

reflective.title: Reflective Notes (Non-Diagnostic)
reflective.narrative_summary: Session context from YYYY-MM-DD with provider [PROVIDER_NAME]. Observed themes: Pain after driving was about 4 out of 10. | Morning stiffness still there. Context sensitivity: monitor day-to-day variability and adherence conditions. This summary is non-diagnostic and intended for workflow reflection only.
pattern_observations: Pain after driving was about 4 out of 10.
context_and_nuance: Different daily conditions can shift performance and comfort signals.
Progress interpretation should include adherence, fatigue, and routine constraints.
reflective.review_prompt: What changed this week in routine, load, or recovery context that best explains the session pattern?

dashboard.ssot_notice: SSOT = canonical session JSON. Dashboard views are downstream projections and should not diverge from canonical source records.
